say this should run when test is called

data/main/functions/zzz/load.mcfunction:
#This file was generated by mcb

say this should run on load
----------------
data/main/functions/zzz/tick.mcfunction:
#This file was generated by mcb

say this should run on tick
----------------

{"values":["main:zzz/tick"]}
